cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Superior 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
18 - 35 years old only 
Live your best life! Four bed dorm rooms, each bed with privacy curtain and charging port. Rooms are fully equipped with A/C and heating, ensuite bathroom and plenty of lockable storage.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Superior 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 Bed Female dorm - 18-35 years old only. Renovated rooms with air conditioning / heating, en -suite bathroom, personal security lockers and privacy curtains and personal light and power point inside bunk bed.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 15th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 15th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
